params.value: select NodeID, Caption, NodeDescription, Description, DNS, SysName, Vendor, SysObjectID, Location, Contact,StatusDescription, NodeStatusRootCause, IOSImage, IOSVersion, LastBoot, SystemUpTime, CPUCount, MachineType, IP, DetailsUrl, TotalMemory  FROM Orion.Nodes n where n.Caption = '${node_caption}'

SELECT concat(CASE ac.Severity WHEN 0 THEN 'Informational' WHEN 1 THEN 'Warning' WHEN 2 THEN 'Critical' WHEN 3 THEN 'Serious' WHEN 4 THEN 'Notice' END, ' - ', count(*)) as Alerts  From Orion.AlertActive aa join Orion.AlertObjects o on aa.alertobjectid=o.alertobjectid join Orion.AlertConfigurations ac on ac.AlertID = o.AlertID where o.RelatedNodeCaption like '${node_caption}'  group by ac.Severity

SELECT concat(si.ShortDescription, ' - ',count(*)) as value From Orion.apm.Application a  join orion.StatusInfo si on si.StatusId = a.Status  where a.node.Caption like '${node_caption}'  group by si.ShortDescription
SELECT si.ShortDescription as value From Orion.nodes n  join orion.StatusInfo si on si.StatusId = n.Status  where n.Caption like '${node_caption}'

SELECT concat(si.ShortDescription, ' - ',count(*)) as value From Orion.apm.Component c  join orion.StatusInfo si on si.StatusId = c.Status where c.application.node.Caption like '${node_caption}' group by si.ShortDescription
select n.NodeStatusRootCause from orion.nodes n where n.caption like '${node_caption}'

select n.LastSystemUpTimePollUtc, n.LastSync, n.ObjectSubType, n.StatCollection, n.DynamicIP, n.Engine.ServerName, n.IP, n.MinutesSinceLastSync, n.NextPoll, n.NextRediscovery, n.PollInterval, n.SkippedPollingCycles, n.SNMPVersion from Orion.Nodes n where n.caption like '${node_caption}'

SELECT Name as [Dependency Name], case when p.Caption is not null then 'Parent' else 'Child' end as Relationship FROM Orion.Dependencies d left join orion.Nodes p on p.Uri = d.ParentUri left join orion.Nodes c on c.Uri = d.ChildUri where p.Caption like '${node_caption}' or c.Caption like '${node_caption}'

SELECT    ac.Name AS [Alert Name]    ,CASE   WHEN ac.Severity = 2 THEN 'Critical'   WHEN ac.Severity = 3 THEN 'Serious'   WHEN ac.Severity = 1 THEN 'Warning'   WHEN ac.Severity = 0 THEN 'Informational'   WHEN ac.Severity = 4 THEN 'Notice'   END AS [Severity]   ,case when o.entitycaption = o.RelatedNodeCaption then o.EntityCaption   else concat(o.RelatedNodeCaption, ' - ', o.entitycaption) end AS [Alert Object]  ,ToLocal(o.AlertActive.TriggeredDateTime) AS [Trigger Time] ,o.AlertActive.TriggeredMessage AS [Message]    ,minutediff(aa.TriggeredDateTime,GETUTCDATE()) as [Time Active]       From Orion.AlertActive aa    join Orion.AlertObjects o on aa.alertobjectid=o.alertobjectid   join Orion.AlertConfigurations ac on ac.AlertID = o.AlertID    where o.RelatedNodeCaption like '${node_caption}' ORDER by aa.TriggeredDateTime DESC

select   count(message) as [Alerts]   ,toutc(datetrunc('minute',timestamp)) as [date]   ,ac.name  FROM Orion.AlertHistory ah   left join orion.alertobjects ao on ah.alertobjectid=ao.alertobjectid   left join orion.AlertConfigurations ac on ac.alertid=ao.alertid    where ah.EventType = 0 and ao.RelatedNodeCaption like '${node_caption}' and ah.TimeStamp > '${__from:date:iso}' and ah.TimeStamp < '${__to:date:iso}' group by datetrunc('minute',timestamp), ac.name    order by [date]

panels.title: Historical Alerts Triggered for this Node

params.value: SELECT    ac.Name AS [Alert Name]    ,CASE   WHEN ac.Severity = 2 THEN 'Critical'   WHEN ac.Severity = 3 THEN 'Serious'   WHEN ac.Severity = 1 THEN 'Warning'   WHEN ac.Severity = 0 THEN 'Informational'   WHEN ac.Severity = 4 THEN 'Notice'   END AS [Severity]   ,case when o.entitycaption = o.RelatedNodeCaption then o.EntityCaption   else concat(o.RelatedNodeCaption, ' - ', o.entitycaption) end AS [Alert Object] ,ah.TimeStamp AS [Trigger Time] ,o.AlertActive.TriggeredMessage AS [Message]   ,minutediff(ah.TimeStamp,ar.TimeStamp) as [Alert Duration]      From Orion.AlertHistory ah join Orion.AlertObjects o on ah.AlertObjectID=o.alertobjectid   join Orion.AlertConfigurations ac on ac.AlertID = o.AlertID join orion.AlertHistory ar on ah.AlertActiveID = ar.AlertActiveID and ar.EventType in (1,8)  where ah.EventType = 0 and o.RelatedNodeCaption like '${node_caption}' ORDER by ah.timestamp DESC

select c.DateTime, round(c.AvgPercentMemoryUsed,1) as PercentMemoryUsed, c.node.Caption from orion.CPULoad c where c.Node.Caption like '${node_caption}' and c.datetime > '${__from:date:iso}' and c.datetime < '${__to:date:iso}'
select r.DateTime, r.node.Caption , round(r.AvgResponseTime,1) as AvgResponseTime , round(r.PercentLoss,1) as AvgLoss  from orion.responsetime r  where r.Node.Caption like '${node_caption}'

SELECT i.Caption, si.ShortDescription as Status, i.InPercentUtil, i.OutPercentUtil, i.Inbps, i.Outbps From Orion.nodes n  join orion.npm.Interfaces i on n.nodeid=i.nodeid join orion.StatusInfo si on si.StatusId = i.Status  --where n.Caption like '${node_caption}'

SELECT v.Fullname as Caption, si.ShortDescription as Status, v.VolumeType, v.Size, v.VolumePercentUsed From Orion.nodes n  join orion.Volumes v on n.nodeid=v.nodeid join orion.StatusInfo si on si.StatusId = v.Status  where n.Caption like '${node_caption}'  order by v.VolumePercentUsed DESC
select DISTINCT caption from orion.nodes n
